4. HAVE YOU RECEIVED TREATMENT FROM A VA MEDICAL CENTER? 4G. HAVE YOU RECENTLY RECEIVED TREATMENT FROM ANY FEDERAL
YES NO Specify Facility: MEDICAL FACILITIES (Military base, etc.)?

YES NO Specify Facility:
